Power calculation

power_compute.Rd

Function which takes in trial parameters for main population modelling results and both control and intervention clusters, computes data using single instance of crt_combined and calculates power

power_compute(
  mainpop_data = list(),
  n_clusters = 1,
  n_patients = 1,
  data_level = "Cluster",
  alpha = 0.05,
  effect_size_sign = "Positive",
  trial_type = "sup",
  delta_eq = NULL,
  delta_ni = NULL,
  n_sims = 1,
  benchmark = "EIR_annual",
  age_start = 0,
  age_end = 65,
  test_time_values = c(0, 1),
  test_type = "RDT",
  flag_pre_clearing = 0,
  censor_period = 0,
  flag_reactive_treatment = 1,
  prop_T_c = 0.9,
  benchmark_mean = 0,
  benchmark_stdev = 0,
  int_mean = 0,
  int_stdev = 0
)

Arguments

mainpop_data

List containing main population data output by mainpop()
n_clusters

Number of clusters (control and intervention)
n_patients

Number of patients per cluster
data_level

Data level to use ("Cluster" or "Individual")
alpha

Significance level
effect_size_sign

Sign of effect to check for ("Positive" or "Negative")
trial_type

Trial type (superiority, equivalence, non-inferiority - "sup", "eq", "ni")
delta_eq

Delta for equivalence trials
delta_ni

Delta for non-inferiority trials
n_sims

Number of iterations
benchmark

Benchmark type to use in choosing clusters ("EIR", "slide_prev", "pcr_prev", or "clin_inc" for new data, "EIR_annual", "slide_prev_annual", "pcr_prev_annual", "clin_inc_annual" for pre-existing annual data in input folder)
age_start

Starting age to use when calculating prevalence or incidence over age range (not used with EIR)
age_end

End age to use when calculating prevalence or incidence over age range (not used with EIR)
test_time_values

Time points at which tests are administered
test_type

Type of test administered ("clin" = clinical, "RDT" = rapid diagnostic test)
flag_pre_clearing

Integer indicating whether patients given pre-trial prophylaxis (if 1, place all patients into prophylaxis category at start)
censor_period

Time period after a positive test during which a patient is not counted towards incidence
flag_reactive_treatment

Integer indicating whether patients are automatically given prophylaxis after a positive test (shifting them into treatment category if a clinical case, prophylaxis category otherwise)
prop_T_c

Treatment probability
benchmark_mean

Mean of benchmark value distribution
benchmark_stdev

Standard deviation of benchmark value distribution
int_mean

Mean of intervention parameter value distribution
int_stdev

Standard deviation of intervention parameter value distribution

Details

Takes a list of parameters, returns inf_boolen.
